Defines Helpers

Summary
xplane_helpers.pyDefines Helpers
XPlaneDebuggerPrints debugging information and optionally logs them to a file.
Properties
log
Functions
__init__
startStarts the debugger and creates a log file, if logging is enabled.
writeWrites a message to the logfile.
debugPrints out a message and also writes it to the logfile if logging is enabled.
exceptionExperimental exception handler.
endEnds the debugging session.
XPlaneProfilerStores profiling information of processes.
Properties
timesdict of stored times used internally.
Functions
__init__
defStarts profiling of a process.
endEnds profiling of a process.
getTimeReturns the time and call number for a process.
getTimesReturns the times and call numbers of all processes.
XPlaneCoordsConverts Blender coordinates into X-Plane coordinates.
Functions
__init__
worldReturns converted object world coordinates.
localReturns converted object local coordinates.
angleReturns angles of a rotation.
convertConverts Blender Vector (x,y,z) into X-Plane Vector
relativeMatrixGet’s the relative matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.
relativeConvertedMatrixGet’s the relative and converted matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.
conversionMatrixReturns the conversion matrix used to convert Blender matrixes to X-Plane matrixes.
convertMatrixConverts a matrix using conversionMatrix.
fromMatrixReturns coordinates for a matrix.
vectorsFromMatrixReturns directional vectors from a given matrix.
getScaleMatrixReturns a matrix with the global scale of a given object

XPlaneDebugger

Prints debugging information and optionally logs them to a file.

Summary
Properties
log
Functions
__init__
startStarts the debugger and creates a log file, if logging is enabled.
writeWrites a message to the logfile.
debugPrints out a message and also writes it to the logfile if logging is enabled.
exceptionExperimental exception handler.
endEnds the debugging session.

Properties

log

boolSet to True to enable logfile.  Default is False.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self)

start

def start(self,
log)

Starts the debugger and creates a log file, if logging is enabled.

Parameters

bool logSet True if log file should be written, else False

write

def write(self,
msg)

Writes a message to the logfile.

Parameters

string msgThe message to write.

debug

def debug(self,
msg)

Prints out a message and also writes it to the logfile if logging is enabled.

Parameters

string msgThe message to output.

exception

def exception(self,
type,
value,
traceback)

Experimental exception handler.  Not working yet.

end

def end(self)

Ends the debugging session.

XPlaneProfiler

Stores profiling information of processes.

Summary
Properties
timesdict of stored times used internally.
Functions
__init__
defStarts profiling of a process.
endEnds profiling of a process.
getTimeReturns the time and call number for a process.
getTimesReturns the times and call numbers of all processes.

Properties

times

dict of stored times used internally.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self)

def

def start(self,
name)

Starts profiling of a process.  If the process has already started profiling, the process counter will be increased.

Parameters

string nameName of the process.

end

def end(self,
name)

Ends profiling of a process.

Parameters

string nameName of the process.

getTime

def getTime(self,
name)

Returns the time and call number for a process.

Parameters

string nameName of the process.

Returns

stringInformation about the the process.

getTimes

def getTimes(self)

Returns the times and call numbers of all processes.  Uses getTime internally.

Returns

stringInformation about the processes.

XPlaneCoords

Converts Blender coordinates into X-Plane coordinates.

Summary
Functions
__init__
worldReturns converted object world coordinates.
localReturns converted object local coordinates.
angleReturns angles of a rotation.
convertConverts Blender Vector (x,y,z) into X-Plane Vector
relativeMatrixGet’s the relative matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.
relativeConvertedMatrixGet’s the relative and converted matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.
conversionMatrixReturns the conversion matrix used to convert Blender matrixes to X-Plane matrixes.
convertMatrixConverts a matrix using conversionMatrix.
fromMatrixReturns coordinates for a matrix.
vectorsFromMatrixReturns directional vectors from a given matrix.
getScaleMatrixReturns a matrix with the global scale of a given object

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self)

world

@staticmethod def world(child,  
invert =  False)

Returns converted object world coordinates.

Parameters

childA Blender object
bool invert(default=False) True if the internaly used matrix should be inverted.

Returns

dict{‘location’,’rotation’,’scale’,’angle’} With world X-Plane coordinates.

local

@staticmethod def local(child,  
parent =  None,
invert =  False)

Returns converted object local coordinates.

Parameters

childBlender object, the child object.
parentBlender object, the parent object or None.  If this is set, coordinates will be calculated relative to the parent.
bool invert(default=False) True if the internaly used matrix should be inverted.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} With world X-Plane coordinates.

angle

@staticmethod def angle(rot,  
localRotation = False)

Returns angles of a rotation.

Parameters

Euler rotEuler rotation.

Returns

list[x,y,z] With angles.

convert

@staticmethod def convert(co,  
scale =  False)

Converts Blender Vector (x,y,z) into X-Plane Vector

Parameters

Vector coBlender Vector
bool scale(default=False) Don’t know anymore.

Returns

list[x,y,z] With converted “co”.

relativeMatrix

@staticmethod def relativeMatrix(child,
parent)

Get’s the relative matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.

Parameters

Matrix childChild matrix.
Matrix parentParent matrix.

Returns

MatrixRelative matrix.

relativeConvertedMatrix

def relativeConvertedMatrix(child_matrix,  
parent_matrix,  
invert =  False)

Get’s the relative and converted matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.  This is not used anymore, as it was producing wrong results.

Parameters

Matrix child_matrixChild matrix.
Matrix parent_matrixParent matrix.
bool invert(default=False) True if the internaly used matrix should be inverted.

Returns

MatrixA relative converted matrix.

conversionMatrix

@staticmethod def conversionMatrix(invert =  False)

Returns the conversion matrix used to convert Blender matrixes to X-Plane matrixes.  Basically this matrix contains a rotation of -90Â° along the x-axis.

Parameters

bool invert(default=False) True if the internaly used matrix should be inverted.

Returns

MatrixConversion matrix.

convertMatrix

@staticmethod def convertMatrix(matrix,  
invert =  False)

Converts a matrix using conversionMatrix.

Parameters

Matrix matrixThe matrix to convert.
bool invert(default=False) True if the internaly used matrix should be inverted.

Returns

MatrixThe converted matrix.

fromMatrix

@staticmethod def fromMatrix(matrix,  
scaleLoc =  False,
localRotation = None)

Returns coordinates for a matrix.

Parameters

Matrix matrixThe matrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} With world X-Plane coordinates.

vectorsFromMatrix

@staticmethod def vectorsFromMatrix(matrix)

Returns directional vectors from a given matrix.

Parameters

Matrix matrixThe matrix.

Returns

Vector of vectors(vx,vy,vz)

getScaleMatrix

Returns a matrix with the global scale of a given object

Paremters

objectA XPlaneObject

Returns

matrixMatrix with global object scale or None if the object is at root level.
